Home.appDescription: Now it's your turn to write! Choose a piece from below and complete the missing texts by writing them yourself. After completing the text, press the evaluation button to see your shortcomings.
Home.yourTurn: Now it's your turn to write! How would continue this paragraph if you were the writer? Type it below.
Home.evaluateError: Unable to evaluate your writing. Can you please try again?
Home.sidebarAlertext: This will permanently delete your chat history and remove your data from our servers.
